column1: Enhanced link attribution improves click reports by automatically differentiating between multiple link clicks that have the same URL on a given page.

column1:
If Yes, Google Analytics allows you to merge sessions from two related sites (such as an ecommerce site and a separate shopping cart site) as a single session.
More Details
column2:
